document.full_text: unidentified attackers threw an explosive device and opened fire on a bus carrying turkish police, killing one officer, in northern turkey near where prime minister tayyip erdogan held an election rally earlier on wednesday, broadcasters said.
document.title: gun, grenade attack on turk police after pm rally
lines_and_colors: unidentified attackers threw an explosive device and opened fire on a bus carrying turkish police, killing one officer, in northern turkey near where prime minister tayyip erdogan held an election rally earlier on wednesday, broadcasters said.
